channel.title: How do i remove a specific item?
channel.description:
I need to remove ALL ags's from peoples accounts and then re-release them.
How can i do this?
Like an economy reset but only a specific item.
thank you

item.title: How do i remove a specific item?
item.dc:creator: @nadnerb_doow nadnerb_doow
item.description:
@nadnerb_doow wrote:

If your server runs off a MySQL database you could run a query to find and remove them, but I doubt it does. Perhaps a check on login to see if someone has an ags and delete it if they do? That still wouldn’t get someone who didn’t login while you had that setup though. Maybe just release the new ags under a different id, as well as having the deletion of the old one on login. That way the old ones could still be deleted even after the new release, but you wouldn’t be creating a discontinued item accidentally.

Tell me if that didn’t make any sense or if you’d like an example, I was sort of running on a train of thought there lol

Read full topic
item.source: How do i remove a specific item?
